item.title: Happy_Chinese_New_Year_In_2017
item.description: TL;DR Below is written by a man that with poor English skills. Read carefully if you really want to read.(But I will say thank you if you really read all the contents below. :) ) Happy Chinese new year! In China, all the Chinese now say goodbye to the “Monkey Year” and step into the “year of Chicken”. Watching the Spring Festival Gala Evening provided by CCTV is a tradition for almost every Chinese.
